abstract.locale: A single row in a listbox. The text of the listitem is specified either using listcell elements, or by placing a label attribute directly on the listitem element.
Один элемент для listbox. Все элементы listitem должны размещаться внутри элемента listbody. Для создания списков с несколькими столбцами, следует использовать элемент listcell.

description.locale: The URL of the image to appear on the element. If this attribute is empty or left out, no image appears.
The label that will appear on the element. If this is left out, no text appears.
Indicates whether the element is selected or not.
The string attribute allows you to associate a data value with an element.
